text.author: Wikinews
text.title: Interview with LibriVox founder Hugh McGuire
text.summary: Hugh McGuire, founder of the free audio-book website LibriVox, explains in an interview about the site why they include only public domain books, how audio-book quality varies, and their Wikipedia-like approach of allowing users to contribute new material, including multiple versions of the same book.
